node.name: Password Encoder
node.shortdescription:
The Password Encoder Eclipse plugin is a simple utility to encrypt
a string using JVM-supported Message Digest algorithms (MD5, SHA-1,
SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512). This is useful during software
development to generate a password that can be cut & pasted into
a security configuration (database table, xml config, etc.) for
use as an initial password or for testing when setting up website
security before admin or self-maintained password setting pages
have been developed. BSD-style license.
node.body:
The Password Encoder Eclipse plugin is a simple utility to encrypt
a string using JVM-supported Message Digest algorithms (MD5, SHA-1,
SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512). This is useful during software
development to generate a password that can be cut & pasted into
a security configuration (database table, xml config, etc.) for
use as an initial password or for testing when setting up website
security before admin or self-maintained password setting pages
have been developed. BSD-style license.
